TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GiveFeedbackEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 事件的資料，事件將發生於拖曳作業期間。

span.span: Provides data for the event, which occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖曳作業期間發生的事件。The event occurs during a drag operation. 它可讓來源修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者的視覺化回饋提供拖放作業期間的拖曳事件。It allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. A物件指定的拖放作業及是否使用預設資料指標類型。A object specifies the type of drag-and-drop operation and whether default cursors are used. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得要顯示的拖放作業回應。

span.span: Gets the drag-and-drop operation feedback that is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定拖曳作業是否應使用與拖放效果關聯的預設游標。

span.span: Gets or sets whether drag operation should use the default cursors that are associated with drag-drop effects.

value.span: 如果使用預設指標，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the default pointers are used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系統會提供不同的拖放作業，例如移動或複製拖放資料指標預設值。The system provides default drag-drop cursors for different drag-drop operations such as move or copy. 如果設為`false`，它是事件來源，設定適當的資料指標的責任。If is set to `false`, it is the responsibility of the event source to set the appropriate cursor. ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example.
